description:
• This course teaches basic business 101 foundation skills and knowledge to help business owners succeed and make money.
  • Students will learn to understand and use standard business language and terms.
  • This course will only take a short amount of time that will change a businesses future.
  • A series of short learning video will teach business owner the needed skills and knowledge to help them create a sustainable business.
  • Business owners CEO's and company leaders need to acquire the knowledge, skills, and behaviors taught in these short videos to become effective business owners and leaders.
  • Our course and training videos shortens the learning curve and training cycles.
  • This course is designed for business owners, partners, employees, contractors & affiliates.

  • It's time to build your business, not the learning curve!
title: Foundations of Business Knowledge
